name: Stop the Nuke
description:
It is the Cold War! You must prevent the nuke from falling, resulting in an explosion that can devastate the whole world!

This is a game created for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 3.

A game I made to pass the time and have a relaxing jam.

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move platform

Credits: Jonas - Programmer, SFX, Art
